content: big deep ridges are a perfect texture for bringing out the thick and chunky quality of bernat blanket extra thick this beginner blanket is perfect for the novice or the more experienced maker looking for a quick project the entire blanket is worked in a single stitch half_double_crochet in the 3rd bar for the ultimate warm and toasty fabric a wonderful choice for the bedroom family room or your secret hideaway materials bernat® blanket extra thick™ 21 2 oz/600 g 72 yds/66 m fog blue 62021 6 balls or 396 yds/362 m
